  3. Planning for a death

Planning for a death

This is a guide for people in NSW who are planning for their own death or the death of someone close to them. It provides information about how to make a will, how to plan a funeral and how to organise finances.

This is standard accordion.

Below is an example standard (plain) accordion looks in New Design System.
